name: PURGATORY (itch) (New Society Gaming)
description:
This game was made for the 2022 Epic Mega Jam.

The dead have risen, and you have been summoned by your worshipers,  You have come to life as an incarnation of your statue in the center of town.  You must send the dead back to where they came from.  If you fail, you'll find yourself in their world.

Controls: 

Gamepad (excluding menus)

     - Left Joystick to move

     - X button to Attack

Keyboard and Mouse

     - W, A, S, D to move

     - Left Mouse Click to Attack
